transcript: one of my favorite business models in the world look at what everyone else is doing do it in half the time if normally it takes you 100 days to get the average customer to win figure out how you can do it in seven figure out how you can do it in three figure out how you can do it in 24 hours think about the difference between the marketing agenty that signs up a customer and says okay we're going to start running your ads and uh it'll take us about 60 days to get you spun up and then you should start getting some lead flop consider that with as soon as the guy hangs up with the sales guy his phone rings hey I just saw your ad now that's obviously a super extreme example on both sides well the closer you are to that one even though the actual deliverable is the same how much more valuable is this one so much more valuable
